text: Uma yeelin Allaah ninna labo qalbi oo ku jira gudahiisa, kamana dhigin afooyinkiinna aad dhabarradooda ku matashaan dhabarrada hooyooyinkiin2, hooyooyinkiin oo kale, kamana dhigin kuwaa aad ku sheegataan inay yihiin ilmahiinna, ilmihiinna runta ah aad dhasheen3. Kuwani wax kale maahee waa hadal uun aad ka tidhaahdaan afafkiinna. Oo Allaah wuxuu ku hadlaa runta, oo Isagaa wax ku hanuunsha Jidka (Toosan)
